name: Asparagus Sandwiches
author: MINIVANMOMOF3
summary: Something different and yummy!  A friend served these finger sandwiches at a baby shower.  I couldn't believe they were so easy! Can be made ahead of time, just cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.  Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf soft, sliced white bread
directions: Set asparagus spears onto paper towels to absorb excess liquid
In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, onion and seasoning salt
Remove crusts from bread slices, and spread mayonnaise mixture thinly on each slice
Place a spear onto the slice and roll up
Cut each roll in half, and arrange on a serving tray
Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until serving
